channel.title: Xisth Pk Spawn-Hybrid server release!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15bklh.png[/img] [b]Welcome to Xisth Pk Xisth Pk is a 317 semi-spawn server, this means you can spawn all items exept shop items. Xisth Pk has a long history, We have been in the top 5 servers of 2010. The server is hosted on a strong Dedicated server to handle many players, we hope to gain many players in minimum time! We also hope to see old Xisth players back! [/b]
==================================================
*
==================================================
[B]PVP SYSTEM[/B] This system works with streaks means, when you kill someone you get 1 PKP each kill even if you are on a streak. But when you killed example 5 people you are on a killingstreak of 5, means if you die you will be rewarded with 5 PKP extra. This Means 5 kills in a row will gain you 10 PKP. Max kill streak is 15 ATM.
[b]-- Update Log --[/b]
- Chaotic Weapons added in pvp drops ( falador,ardounge) - Rocktails added with effect - Added Hybrid/Melee set in Quest Tab - Added working PVP system - Added Curses - Added 602 gfx/anim
[b]Perfect Rush and Switching[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1p9eua.gif[/img]
[b]Home[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qkny41.png[/img]
[b]Pk shop[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dortec.png[/img]
Bank [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vjpgte.png[/img]
[b]spec altar ( refills special attack @ home )[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/o76kxi.png[/img]
[b]Pk portal[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2w398gm.png[/img]
[b]Torva With working effects[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lk9w0w.png[/img]
[b]PVP SYSTEM[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24bvh50.png[/img]
[b]::getid [name] ( easy to get the item id )[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vcap9w.png[/img]
[b]Commands[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/r1akvl.png[/img]
[b]Rocktail effect[/b] ( when you eat @ full hp ) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2n1armr.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]I`m releasing Xisth after awhile, i founded a backup from the server on my computer and i though i just release it ;) Flame/Hate i don`t care, i quited rsps awhile ago.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]things that needs to be fixed:
- Turmoil doesn`t seem to work - Some glitching npc`s - quick prayers [/CENTER][/B]
Download : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?trmjuqbvv6jfwwf]Xisthserver+client+cache.rar[/url]
scan: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33xa5h1.png[/img]

item.title: Xisth Pk Spawn-Hybrid server release!
item.dc:creator: @steve55 steve55
item.description:
@steve55 wrote:

[center]
Welcome to Xisth Pk
Xisth Pk is a 317 semi-spawn server, this means you can spawn all items exept shop items.
Xisth Pk has a long history, We have been in the top 5 servers of 2010.
The server is hosted on a strong Dedicated server to handle many players, we hope to gain many players in minimum time!
We also hope to see old Xisth players back!

==================================================

==================================================

PVP SYSTEM
This system works with streaks means, when you kill someone you get 1 PKP each kill even if you are on a streak.
But when you killed example 5 people you are on a killingstreak of 5, means if you die you will be rewarded with 5 PKP extra.
This Means 5 kills in a row will gain you 10 PKP.
Max kill streak is 15 ATM.

– Update Log –

  • Chaotic Weapons added in pvp drops ( falador,ardounge)
  • Rocktails added with effect
  • Added Hybrid/Melee set in Quest Tab
  • Added working PVP system
  • Added Curses
  • Added 602 gfx/anim

Perfect Rush and Switching

Home

spec altar ( refills special attack @ home )

PVP SYSTEM

::getid [name] ( easy to get the item id )

Commands

Rocktail effect ( when you eat @ full hp )

[SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]Im releasing Xisth after awhile, i founded a backup from the server on my computer and i though i just release it ;) Flame/Hate i dont care, i quited rsps awhile ago.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]things that needs to be fixed:

  • Turmoil doesn`t seem to work
  • Some glitching npc`s
  • quick prayers [/CENTER][/B]

Download : Xisthserver+client+cache.rar
